mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: "It was built in 1911 and has been listed on the National Register of Historic Places since 1978... Sullivan began this study of the bank and its functions beginning with the large banking room and working out from there while reducing the cost of the structure by cutting back on the terra cotta ornamentation. The building was finished in 1912." -- http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Peoples_Savings_Bank [work]
